From Wikipedia: Acclaimed horror author Stephen King wrote "Let Me In is a genre-busting triumph. Not just a horror film, but the best American horror film in the last 20 years." 

Say no more Chloe Grace Moretz is a star !

This is the remake of "Morse, Let the right one in" a Danish movie, as usual America copies a masterpiece and then takes credit for it, just like "The ring". I don't say don't watch it, but make sure you watch the original too.

Sorry to disappoint but this is the remake of "Morse, Let the right one in" a Danish movie, as usual America copies a masterpiece and then takes credit for it, I don't say don't watch it, but make sure you watch the original too. Personally this version is pretty much like the original but just not as good.
